question: Which among the following was absolutely true about Meera Bai ?
option2: She was a devotee of Lord Krishna
option3: She was a daughter in law of Rana Sanga
explanation: Meera Bai was a Rajput Princess of Merta and wife of Bhoj Raj (son of Rana Sanga of Chittor). She was a great worshipper of Krishna and her collection of devotional songs or poems viz. Mere to Girdhar Gopal doosro na koi, etc. are known as Padavali.
